name: Dudley Public Art Heritage Trail (Priory Park Trail)

ai.summary: A gentle 1.5 km urban heritage trail through Dudley's Priory Park, highlighting public art and local history along easy, family-friendly paths.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-maintained paths with paved surfaces; some gravel sections and gentle slopes near park entrances; benches and art installations along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths; be mindful of uneven paving and seasonal wet spots; watch for cyclists and other pedestrians in shared areas; supervise children near water features; check park hours and any event closures; carry water and wear appropriate footwear, especially in wet or icy conditions.
ai.best_seasons: All year, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and autumn; summers are suitable with shade in the park, winters can be windy or wet.
